summary: This adds Sarah Thanos to your game, she can be found in Dragonsbridge outside near the Four Shields Tavern.
descriptionHtml:
Sarah Thanos is an follower that excells in ranged combat with Bows and Crossbows. She has perks to allow her to wear armor, sneak, and use Bows and Crossbows more efficiently. Sarah has a combat style I created that revolves around using Archery.

--Location--
Dragonsbridge next to the Four Shields Tavern

==Please Note--
Sarah's perks are not compatible with Skyre

=Compatibility=
Compatible with all body mods. I created a facepatch so there should be no dark face bug

Requirements:
Pretty Face for Females
ApachiiSkyHairFemale v1.4

~Working On~
Creating a balanced weapon that Sarah uses
Figure out a better place to put her
Make her standalone
New screenshots

Changelog:
v1.1 Adjusted facial appearance and changed stuff around
v1.0- Initial release
author: Legendzerox
